tha-ap8:13.2: seṭṭhe ca → seṭṭhe va (pts-vp-pli1ed) | heṭṭhā ca (mr)
tha-ap8:24.3: Kiṇitvā → kītvā (bj) | katvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kitvā (mr)
tha-ap8:29.1: Satasahassenāvāsaṃ → āvāsaṃ satasahassena (bj) | āvāsasatasahasse (si) | āvāse satasahasse (sya1ed, sya2ed) | āvāsasatasahassena (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap8:29.3: Vepullaṃ taṃ māpayitvā → vepullataṃ pāpayitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vepullataṃ māpayitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap8:30.3: taṃ vīra → te vīra (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | taṃ dhīra (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap8:40.1: Saṭṭhi → saṭṭhī (sya1ed, sya2ed) | saṭṭhiṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed), tūrasahassāni → turiyasahassāni (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap8:79.4: Dhammevaṃ vijanayiṃ ahaṃ → dhamme vijanayiṃ ahaṃ (bj) | dhammaṃ vijaṭi taṃpihaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dhamme va vijaṭāyahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | dhammevaṃ vijaṭayiṃ (aṭṭha.)
tha-ap8:94.1: Mamatto → māmako (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mamattho (si) | samaggo (sya1ed, sya2ed), yo → so (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap8:111.3: Vinayogadhaṃ taṃ → vinayogadhitaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vinaye kathitaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap8:147.4: tasmā vo avirodhiyā → vo avirodhiyo (bj) | te avirodhiyā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vo avirādhiyā (csp1ed)
tha-ap8:148.4: tasmā te na virodhiyā → te na virādhiyā (csp1ed)
